Articles.Content: I am on my way to Duna and just escaped form Kerbin, but now I can only control my engine with the 'Z' key. It will not throttle. It is all or nothing. When I right click on it, I can't change the trust either, it is stuck at 100%, so I am thinking it is not a keyboard issue. It is a basic LV-T45. The only mod I have is MechJeb, but it is not enabled. Is there some way I can get control of the engine again?

I think I solved it myself. I went into the F12 debug window and click on 'Input Locks', I clicked on 'Clear Input Locks' and the engine throttles again. I just do not know what I did to cause that?

Edited December 4, 2016 by Ty Tan Tu

12 minutes ago, Ty Tan Tu said:

I just do not know what I did to cause that?

Are you playing with the stock comm net turned on? It sounds like your ship was under 'limited control', which is what happens when it's out of communication range with Kerbin.
That is what happened. My comm is now out of range of the comm net. It makes sense that it only happened after my escape from Kerbin. Oh well, now I know who to cheat and 'fix' that.
The other way you can get control back is to turn off the CommNet functionality in the Settings/Difficulty menu.
